data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Fernando Pacheco. The finish is off target, however.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Bahia a goal kick.
Gilberto (Bahia) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 4, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Fluminense's area.
In the minute 11, Hudson (Fluminense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 13, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior waits before resuming play because Yago Felipe for Fluminense is still down.
Ernando is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Yago Felipe is back on his feet again.
Fluminense's Danilo Barcelos is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Attention is being given to Fluminense’s Danilo Barcelos and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
Ernando is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Ernando, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 19, The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Danilo Barcelos, who is down injured.
Ernando is back on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Fluminense.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Danilo Barcelos for Fluminense is back on the field again.
In the minute 22, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bahia's half.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Bahia are coming forward and Gilberto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Fred. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 29, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Bahia are pushing forward but Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Ernando is back on the pitch.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Bahia.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Rossi, who is grimacing with pain.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
In the minute 37, Rossi for Bahia is back on the field again.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Fluminense.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Elias (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Bahia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Fluminense's Danilo Barcelos has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Free kick Fluminense.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Bahia.
In Rio de Janeiro, Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) misses the target with a header.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Fluminense are on the attack at Estadio do Maracana, where Fernando Pacheco is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 53, Daniel for Bahia has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bahia's half.
In the minute 56, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 58, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 60, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nino.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Fluminense’s Nino is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Fluminense.
Rossi of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Bahia.
Fluminense's Fred gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Bahia's Gregore misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Bahia make their first substitution with Marco Antonio replacing Daniel.
Saldanha is on a sub for Gilberto for Bahia.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Penalty! Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior points to the spot, great chance for Fluminense...
Nene converts the penalty to give Fluminense a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 73, Bahia surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Saldanha’s header is off-target.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a first substitution, with Caio Paulista replacing Fernando Pacheco.
In the minute 77, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Felippe Cardoso replacing Fred.
Fessin is replacing Clayson for Bahia at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 78, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia.
The away team replace Gregore with Elber.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Bahia.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Fluminense.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Bahia throw-in in Fluminense's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Nino Paraiba is replacing Ernando for the away team.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
The home team have replaced Nene with Luiz Henrique. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Igor Juliao, who is down injured.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 88, Fluminense's Igor Juliao looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia.
Bahia are coming forward and Marco Antonio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Fluminense.
Free kick Fluminense.
Bahia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fluminense.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro. The final score is 1-0.
Digao (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
Lucas Fonseca for Bahia has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and receives a first yellow card.
Marco Antonio is booked for the away team.
Luccas Claro is on a sub for Yago Felipe for Fluminense.
